/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Street lamps and power lines stretch out into the distance, hinting at the city's infrastructure. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, capturing the city's blend of nature and urban life.
